transcript.title: MINISTERIAL ARRANGEMENTS
transcript.content:
I have decided to broaden the role of the Special Minister of State,

Senator Nick Minchin, as Minister Assisting the Prime Minister.

At present, Senator Minchin assists me in relation to native title

issues and matters concerning the Constitutional Convention.

Now that the bulk of his work regarding the Convention has been completed,

it is possible to expand his role as Minister assisting me across

the range of all of my responsibilities.

I am sure that Senator Minchin will discharge his new responsibilities

very effectively.

1 March 1998
